title: Bug 102623 - Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image again into the layout view, the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
EB: When importing a new image into the layout view, the newly imported image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete this image file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Import the renamed 'image1.jpg' into the layout view again.
